Package com.view

Class CommandLineView

java.lang.Object
com.view.CommandLineView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ActiveView, PassiveView, View
public class CommandLineView extends Object implements PassiveView, ActiveView
The type Command line view. Gives all the methods related to the command line view.
